summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5606 for the improvement of 38th Avenue West, from West Dravus Street to Tilden Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 73806, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
